00020 namespace Util
00021 {
00022 
00028    template <class Type, int N>
00029    class FArrayParam : public Parameter
00030    {
00031    
00032    public:
00033    
00035       FArrayParam(const char *label, FArray<Type, N>& array);
00036  
00042       void readParam(std::istream &in);
00043  
00049       void writeParam(std::ostream &out);
00050 
00051    protected:
00052    
00054       FArray<Type, N>* arrayPtr_;
00055    
00056    };
00057 
00058    /*
00059    * FArrayParam<Type, N> constructor.
00060    */
00061    template <class Type, int N>
00062    FArrayParam<Type, N>::FArrayParam(const char *label, FArray<Type, N>& array)
00063     : Parameter(label),
00064       arrayPtr_(&array)
00065    {}
00066 
00067    /*
00068    * Read a FArray parameter.
00069    */
00070    template <class Type, int N>
00071    void FArrayParam<Type, N>::readParam(std::istream &in)
00072    {
00073 
00074       if (isParamIoProcessor()) {
00075          in >> label_;
00076          for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00077             in >> (*arrayPtr_)[i];
00078          }
00079          if (ParamComponent::echo()) {
00080             writeParam(Log::file());
00081          }
00082       }
00083       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00084          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00085             bcast<Type>(paramCommunicator(), &((*arrayPtr_)[0]), N, 0); 
00086       #endif
00087 
00088    }
00089 
00090    /*
00091    * Write a FArray parameter.
00092    */
00093    template <class Type, int N>
00094    void FArrayParam<Type, N>::writeParam(std::ostream &out) 
00095    {
00096       Label space("");
00097       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00098          if (i == 0) {
00099             out << indent() << label_;
00100          } else {
00101             out << indent() << space;
00102          }
00103          out << std::right << std::scientific 
00104              << std::setprecision(Parameter::Precision) 
00105              << std::setw(Parameter::Width)
00106              << (*arrayPtr_)[i] 
00107              << std::endl;
00108       }
00109    }
00110 
00111 } 
00112 #endif
